channel.title: 2hander glitch!?!? how to fix! PLEASE HELP SOON!
channel.description:
Basically on my server when your equipping a 2hander, then you try and equip a shield that you dont meet the requirements for it removes your 2hander but you keep the stats of it and you can attack with your fists at the same strength that weapon would be.
Like Wearing d2h equip rune defender cant wear rune defender d2h is unequipped you keep bonuses of d2h on ur fist
does anyone know fix?!

item.title: 2hander glitch!?!? how to fix! PLEASE HELP SOON!

Goto to the rules for the “Server Help” section, it will say!

Read full topic
